abstract: Gefilte fish, chicken soup and fish n' chips.
description: Jenni Klempfner explores her ancestors' Polish and Jewish heritage as well as her own multi-cultural family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000983; Stories from the Jewish Community; Active; 2007
